Query.Sentence: /*Obtiene las subscripciones activas hasta el dia de hoy*/ WITH ACTIVE_SUBSCRIPTIONS AS ( SELECT S.SUBS_ID, S.PLATF_ID, S.FR_ID, S.SUBS_END_DATE, S.SUBS_START_DATE, S.SUBS_PRICE, S.SUBS_AUTORENEWAL, S.USER_ FROM subscription S WHERE (S.SUBS_END_DATE >= CURRENT_DATE AND S.SUBS_START_DATE < CURRENT_DATE) ) SELECT * FROM ACTIVE_SUBSCRIPTIONS ACS INNER JOIN PUBLIC.PLATFORM P ON ACS.PLATF_ID = P.PLATF_ID INNER JOIN PUBLIC.FREQUENCY F ON ACS.FR_ID = F.FR_ID #WHERE#

/*actualiza subscripciones activas*/ WITH ACTIVE_SUBSCRIPTIONS AS ( SELECT S.SUBS_ID, S.PLATF_ID, S.FR_ID, S.SUBS_END_DATE, S.SUBS_START_DATE, S.SUBS_PRICE, S.SUBS_AUTORENEWAL, S.USER_, (S.SUBS_END_DATE = CURRENT_DATE) AS ACTIVE FROM subscription S ) SELECT * FROM ACTIVE_SUBSCRIPTIONS ACS INNER JOIN PUBLIC.PLATFORM P ON ACS.PLATF_ID = P.PLATF_ID INNER JOIN PUBLIC.FREQUENCY F ON ACS.FR_ID = F.FR_ID WHERE ACTIVE AND (SUBS_AUTORENEWAL = TRUE )
